column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////1 star for the line!  Sucks that there's a line to just get pastries.  It was out the door!  Even on a day when it was 38 degrees F outside! I waited in line for 20 minutes to get pastries and the guy behind me waited just as long just to get two loaves of bread. Additionally
column3: so no one sat outside and everyone was clamoring for a place to sit.  Different parties were sharing tables
column5: it is "Common Bond" Bakery after all
column6: right?  I don't really care if I have to share tables with someone
column7: but it just attests to how busy and crowded this place is.
